amendment.description: Amendment requires the Commandant of the Coast Guard to review and report to Congress on whether the currently authorized level of active duty personnel is adequate for carrying out all of the Coast Guard's missions.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 2 printed in the Congressional Record to include a reporting requirment regarding adequacy of active duty strength.

action.text: Amendment (A009) offered by Ms. Sanchez, Loretta.
Sanchez, Loretta amendment (A009) modified by unanimous consent. Modification clarifies the functions of the Coast Guard affected by the reporting requirment.
On agreeing to the Sanchez, Loretta amendment (A009) as modified Agreed to by voice vote.
